dataList.dlg: Hello, privyet~ Presenting the rep of Rosespanner Workshop, I’m Rodya~
Yaaawn… Take it easy, baby~ Get some coffee if you wanna. No need to wear yourself out so early in the morn~

You’re here? Check this out! I did it~ Won big again~ I earn more from playing card games during lunch than I do with a week’s work of running this joint~
…Sniffle.
I’ll be going first~ What the, you’re staying for overtime? Oh boy… Got some work cut out, huh. You’ll get paid handsomely, I promise!

We make all the weapons we use~ Oh, what’s wrong with this stupid thing…
Haha, w—we also fix ‘em all by ourselves.
Ooh~ Whuzzat, whuzzat? Got a job for me?
Am I not doing any work? Well, you see~ I’m a fieldwork kinda person. Fuhu. It’s gonna be fine, others’ve got the desk work covered, I’m sure~

Whaaat~?! Slot machines? Ugh, you dummy. You really think you can win money from that?
You gotta use your skills!

Alright, take a seat here… Hold the mouse! That’s right. And when you click this~ You get into a game with that bucko!
Wha… Four of a kind?!
Whoocha~ Guess I’ll lie down for a wee bit~
Hm~? I’m already the rep, I don’t see how I can get to a higher position~ Just get us more work instead!
Aight, let’s go for a round!
Let’s get this bread~!
Mm? Bit busy right now, make it quick!
Let’s go!
Hmheh, pinched ‘em right!
Kuh…
Yeah, that’s one done!
If I knew this would happen… I woulda gone for a bigger spree… the other day.
Hmph, what a piece of rice cake!
Psh… None of my tools fit.
Got it! That should keep us afloat~ And if I wanna pay my bosom buddies a handsome salary, I’ve gotta make more fortune out of it~ Huhu.
Heehey, this is a huge success, ain’t it? Am I gonna get a bonus?
Ha… This might can the contract…
